item.title: Goodbye 2019
item.description: I was leaving for Los Angelos on 24th December 2019. At the time, I created this bucket list to create memories with families and friends before leaving Home Kong üá≠üá∞! Goodbye for now.

item.title: My first 50Km - A note to myself
HK50 2019 Race Report
item.description: I checked off a 50Km ultra run in my bucket list before the end of 2019. The run was a dream, a sweet dream for me. And now I‚Äôm proud to call myself an ultra runner.

item.title: 6 months updates on my 10-day Vipassana meditation experience
item.description: I went to the Vipassana Meditation Center in Lantau, Hong Kong for a new student‚Äôs ten day course about 6 months ago in April 2019. I completed it and I went home thinking ‚ÄúI‚Äôm fixed‚Äù. This is a journal of how and why it came about as well as my experiences during and after the course.

item.title: Why I went from a software engineer to a research assistant? Industry vs academia?
item.description: I‚Äôve recently transited from working as a software engineer in a technology startups to a research assistant (RA) in electrical engineering. People are often interested and even surprised in my transition from working in the tech industry to academia.
